result.markdown: --- title: "Week 1: Foundations of R programming" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## Main reference * [1-8, *Advanced R*](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/foundations-intro.html) ## What you will learn this week * Scalars and vectors * Lists and data frames * Subsetting * Functions * Environments * Conditions ## Slides for week Download pdf ## Assignments * [Assignment 1](../assignments/A1.qmd) is due on Friday 21 March.
